director.name: 哈米德·萨达尔 Hamid Sardar Afkhani

this_title: Becoming a Man: Tracking the White Reindeer
trans_title: 成为男人：寻觅白色驯鹿
introduction: In the remote plains of northern Mongolia, the Tsaatan nomads are a proud people who live off hunting and gathering. They travel on the backs of reindeer, on which they completely depend to survive. Quizilol, 18, and the beautiful Solongo are in love. But Solongo’s father believes that Quizilol is not mature enough to marry his daughter. Only if Quizilol shows that he is capable of raising a herd of reindeer by himself will he marry Solongo.在白雪覆盖的蒙古北部平原上生活着查坦族游牧民。年轻的Quizilol和美丽的Solongo相爱了。为了向Solongo的父亲证明自己是一个足以娶其女儿的男人，Quizilol不得不展示自己有能力饲养一群驯鹿。
chinese_title: 成为男人：寻觅白色驯鹿
foreign_title: Becoming a Man: Tracking the White Reindeer
